movie.title: American Made
movie.plot: The true story of pilot Barry Seal, who transported contraband for the CIA and the Medellin cartel in the 1980s.

events.title: Barry Seal agrees to become a DEA informant
Barry Seal uses a plane with hidden cameras to deliver cocaine to Nicaragua
Barry Seal is murdered outside a Salvation Army Center
